# Celestial Cartographers
## Scripture
"And God said, 'Let there be lights in the vault of the sky to separate the day from the night, and let them serve as signs to mark sacred times, and days and years.'" - Genesis 1:14
## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we are reminded of the celestial cartographers who have mapped the stars and constellations for centuries. Yet, the ultimate Cartographer is God Himself, who has woven the fabric of the universe with precision and purpose. The phases of the moon, the rotation of the planets, and the dance of the stars all testify to God's sovereign plan. Just as cartographers map the earth to guide us on our journey, God has mapped the heavens to guide us on our spiritual journey. The celestial bodies serve as signs to mark sacred times, reminding us of God's faithfulness and presence in our lives.
## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, we marvel at the beauty and complexity of the night sky. As we navigate the journey of life, help us to look to the celestial bodies as reminders of Your sovereignty and faithfulness. May we be guided by the light of Your presence, and may our lives be aligned with Your eternal plan. As we gaze up at the stars, fill us with wonder, awe, and a deeper understanding of Your infinite nature. Amen.
